summary: "We Are the World" is a famous song recorded in 1985 by many popular musicians to help raise money for famine relief in Africa. Written by Michael Jackson and Lionel Richie, the song sold over 20 million copies and won several awards. It was inspired by a similar project by the British group Band Aid. The song's success led to a music video, various merchandise, and even a new version recorded in 2010 to help Haiti after an earthquake.
title: We Are the World
